item.title: Poco launches X7, X7 Pro with MediaTek Dimensity chipsets in India - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Poco launches X7, X7 Pro with MediaTek Dimensity chipsets in India

Date: 09 January 2025, Source: Deccan Herald

Poco, a subsidiary of Xiaomi, has launched the new X7 series phones, including the X7 and X7 Pro, in Jaipur, India.

  • The Poco X7 Pro features a 6.67-inch 1.5K OLED display with 120Hz refresh rate, powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Ultra chipset.
  • Equipped with a 50MP dual-camera and 20MP front camera, it can record 4K video at 60fps.
  • It supports 90W fast charging with a 6,550mAh battery.
  • The standard Poco X7 offers similar display features but with a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultra chipset and a triple-camera setup.
  • The devices are priced starting at Rs 21,999 for the X7 and Rs 27,999 for the X7 Pro.
“The top-end POCO X7 Pro comes in various colors and configurations, highlighting Poco's focus on quality and performance at mid-range prices.”

The launch of the Poco X7 series exemplifies the company's commitment to providing powerful smartphones for the mid-range market.

item.title: CES 2025: The 17 most impressive products you don't want to miss - ZDNet
item.description:
CES 2025: The 17 Most Impressive Products You Don't Want to Miss

Date: January 7, 2025 Source: ZDNET

The biggest week in tech is here: the annual Consumer Electronics Show (CES). ZDNET is reporting live from Las Vegas on the most striking products and concepts presented at the event.

  • AI-integrated TVs from Samsung and LG with advanced features for enhanced viewing.
  • A TCL premium entry-level TV available for pre-order equipped with Mini LED technology.
  • Affordable over-the-counter glucose monitors for diabetic health management.
  • Quick battery swap devices like Swippit that charge phones in seconds.
  • Upgraded smart rings from Circular with new health-monitoring capabilities.
  • Roborock's innovative robot vacuum featuring an arm to remove obstacles while cleaning.
  • Lenovo's rollable laptop that expands its screen size dynamically.
  • The world's first 500W charger for power-hungry devices.
  • EvieAI, an AI-driven wellness assistant trained on medical literature.
  • Smart glasses featuring an invisible display for enhanced functionality.
  • New smart home devices, including products from Ring that enhance safety.
  • A controlling smart ring that allows users to manipulate devices just by pointing at them.
  • Headphones that use a unique technique to clean ears while in use.
  • New devices from TCL that improve visual comfort with advanced display technology.
  • A variety of laptops announced with AI features and improved designs.
  • A hands-free smart lock utilizing ultra-wideband technology for enhanced security.
  • An alternative audio format to Dolby Atmos announced by Samsung and Google.

Stay tuned as CES continues, bringing us more innovations that shape the future of technology.

item.title: Strategic update - GlobeNewswire
item.description:
Strategic update

Date: January 9, 2025 | Source: Ubisoft

Ubisoft is undertaking significant operational changes to enhance player experiences and maximize value creation while reducing costs and refocusing its investments.

  • Appointment of leading advisors to explore strategic options for stakeholder value.
  • Expected cost reductions exceeding €200 million by FY2025-26.
  • Closure of three production studios and discontinuation of XDefiant.
  • Additional development time granted to Assassin’s Creed Shadows for improved quality based on player feedback.
  • Estimated Q3 FY2024-25 net bookings around €300 million, influenced by lower holiday sales.
“We made good progress on the strategic and execution reviews initiated a few months ago and are confident that this will position Ubisoft for a stronger future.” - Yves Guillemot, CEO

The strategic review indicates a proactive approach to ensure sustained growth and engagement with the player community.

item.title: Oppo Reno 13 and Reno 13 Pro launched: Camera-centric smartphones with 50 MP selfie camera. Check India pr - The Economic Times
item.description:
Oppo Reno 13 and Reno 13 Pro: Camera-Centric Smartphones with 50 MP Selfie Camera Launched

Date: Today - Source: Official Announcement

Oppo has launched the Reno 13 series, comprising the Reno 13 Pro and Reno 13, designed specifically for camera enthusiasts.

Price and Variants

  • Oppo Reno 13 Pro: 12GB RAM + 256GB Storage - Rs 49,999
  • Oppo Reno 13 Pro: 12GB RAM + 512GB Storage - Rs 52,999
  • Oppo Reno 13: 8GB RAM + 128GB Storage - Rs 37,999
  • Oppo Reno 13: 8GB RAM + 256GB Storage - Rs 39,999

The devices are available via Oppo's website and Flipkart.

Display and Design

The Reno 13 Pro features a 6.83-inch display with a 120 Hz refresh rate, while the Reno 13 has a 6.59-inch display, both with a maximum brightness of 1,200 nits. Both models include a 50 MP selfie camera and have an IP66, IP68, and IP69 rating for dust and water resistance.

Camera

The Reno 13 Pro includes a triple rear camera setup: a 50 MP Sony IMX890 main camera, a 50 MP telephoto camera, and an 8 MP ultrawide camera. The Reno 13 features a 50 MP main camera, an 8 MP ultrawide, and a 2 MP monochrome lens.

Performance, Hardware & OS

Powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 processor, both devices support up to 12 GB of RAM and 512 GB of storage, running ColorOS 15 based on Android 15. The Reno 13 Pro has a 5,800 mAh battery, while the Reno 13 comes with a 5,600 mAh battery, both supporting 80 W charging.

item.title: Poco X7 Pro 5G and Poco X7 launched with MediaTek processors and 20 MP front camera - The Hindu
item.description:
Poco X7 Pro 5G and Poco X7 launched with MediaTek processors and 20 MP front camera

Published on: January 09, 2025 - Source: The Hindu

Poco has unveiled the X7 series smartphones, targeting mid-range buyers in India. The series includes the Poco X7 5G and Poco X7 Pro 5G, featuring advanced displays and processors.

  • The Poco X7 Pro 5G features a 6.73-inch AMOLED display with a 120 Hz refresh rate.
  • The Poco X7 has a 6.67-inch AMOLED 3D display also with a 120 Hz refresh rate.
  • Both models are powered by MediaTek processors and come with impressive camera systems.
  • The Poco X7 Pro includes a 6,550 mAh battery with a 90 W charger; the X7 has a 5,500 mAh battery with a 45 W charger.
  • The pricing starts at ₹21,999 for the Poco X7 and ₹26,999 for the Poco X7 Pro.
The Poco X7 Pro runs on MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Ultra with Xiaomi HyperOS 2.0 based on Android 15.

In conclusion, the Poco X7 series smartphones are set to offer high specifications at competitive pricing, with pre-orders starting soon on Flipkart.

item.title: Oppo Reno 13 series launched in India with MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset: Check price, specifications and more - Mint
item.description:
Oppo Reno 13 Series Launched in India with MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Chipset

Date: January 9, 2023 | Source: Live Mint

Oppo has unveiled the Reno 13 5G and Reno 13 Pro 5G smartphones in India, featuring the Mediatek Dimensity 8350 chipset along with enhanced specifications and design.

  • The Reno 13 Pro 5G is priced at ₹49,999 for 12GB RAM and 256GB storage, and ₹54,999 for 512GB storage.
  • The Reno 13 5G starts from ₹37,999 for 8GB RAM and 128GB storage, going to ₹39,999 for 256GB storage.
  • Both devices will be available for purchase starting January 11 via Flipkart and Oppo’s official online store.
  • They are powered by ColorOS 15 based on Android 15 along with 12GB of LPDDR5X RAM and up to 512GB UFS 3.0 storage.
  • The Reno 13 Pro features a 6.83-inch 1.5K AMOLED display, while the Reno 13 comes with a 6.59-inch full-HD+ AMOLED display.
  • Photography is supported by a 50MP front camera and multiple rear camera configurations including a triple rear camera setup for the Pro variant.
  • Both models support 80W fast charging and feature high water resistance ratings (IP66, IP68, IP69).
"The Reno 13 series promises a blend of performance and elegance, armed with top-end features for photography and gaming enthusiasts."

This launch enhances Oppo's portfolio in India with devices that cater to both high performance and photography needs.

item.title: Oppo Reno 13 series launched in India with MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset: Check price, specifications and more | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Oppo Reno 13 Series Launched in India with MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Chipset

Date: January 9, 2023 Source: Live Mint

Oppo has unveiled its latest smartphones, the Reno 13 5G and Reno 13 Pro 5G, featuring MediaTek's cutting-edge Dimensity 8350 chipset and a variety of impressive specifications compared to their predecessors.

  • Pricing: Reno 13 Pro 5G starts at ₹49,999, and Reno 13 5G starts at ₹37,999.
  • Launch Date: Both devices available for purchase starting January 11, 2023, via Flipkart and Oppo's official store.
  • Specifications: Both models operate on ColorOS 15 based on Android 15, with up to 12GB RAM and 512GB storage.
  • Display: Reno 13 Pro features a 6.83-inch 1.5K AMOLED, while the Reno 13 has a 6.59-inch full-HD+ AMOLED display.
  • Camera: Both models include a powerful 50MP front camera, with the Pro model featuring a robust triple rear camera setup.
  • Fast Charging: Supports 80W fast charging along with excellent dust and water resistance ratings (IP66, IP68, IP69).
“The Reno 13 Pro 5G boasts a triple rear camera setup, featuring a 50MP Sony IMX890 sensor with OIS and 3.5x optical zoom.”

The launch of the Oppo Reno 13 series in India marks a significant advancement in smartphone technology, appealing particularly to photography enthusiasts and gamers alike.

item.title: Poco X7 series with MediaTek Dimensity chipsets goes official: Check price, specs, and other details - The Indian Express
item.description:
Poco X7 Series Launched with MediaTek Dimensity Chipsets

Publication Date: January 9, 2025
Source: Indian Express

Poco has officially launched the Poco X7 and Poco X7 Pro, two mid-range smartphones packed with impressive specifications and features aimed at enhancing user productivity.

  • The Poco X7 features the MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultra chipset and a 6.67-inch 1.5K 120Hz AMOLED display.
  • It has a dual-tone design with a 50MP primary camera and 8MP ultrawide lens, plus a 20MP selfie camera.
  • The device runs on HyperOS based on Android 14 and supports three years of updates.
  • Equipped with a 5,500mAh battery and 45W fast charging capability.
  • The Poco X7 Pro upgrades to a Dimensity 8400 Ultra chipset, a 6.73-inch display, a 6,550mAh battery, and 90W fast charging.
“Both phones come with IP68 and IP69 dust and water protection, enabling durability against submersion.”

The base model of the Poco X7 is priced at Rs 19,999, while the Pro variant starts at Rs 24,999. The Poco X7 will be available on January 17, and the Poco X7 Pro on January 14 via Flipkart.

This launch marks a significant step for Poco in the competitive smartphone market, providing advanced features at attractive price points.

item.title: Sennheiser launches SoundProtex earplugs for safe listening - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Sennheiser Launches SoundProtex Earplugs for Safe Listening

Publication Date: Not specified Source: CNBC TV18

Sennheiser has unveiled its new SoundProtex earplugs, designed to protect hearing while delivering clear, high-quality sound during concerts, festivals, and everyday use.

  • SoundProtex earplugs feature patented membrane filter technology that maintains sound spectrum while reducing harmful volume levels.
  • The two-stage filters allow balanced audio, ensuring music brilliance and clear conversations.
  • Durable and reusable, made from medical-grade TPE material with three sizes of ear tips for a comfortable fit.
  • Includes a full block filter for situations requiring complete silence, like sleeping or swimming.
  • Pricing is set at ₹1,990, available from January 10, 2025.
"With SoundProtex, we are excited to offer music enthusiasts in India a safe way to enjoy their favourite events without compromising on sound quality," said Vijay Sharma, General Manager, Sennheiser Consumer Business, India.

The launch of SoundProtex earplugs showcases Sennheiser's commitment to innovative audio solutions that cater to the evolving needs of consumers.

item.title: Samsung Likely To Unveil Its Tri-Fold Phone This Year But Everybody Won’t Get It - News18
item.description:
Samsung Likely To Unveil Its Tri-Fold Phone This Year But Everybody Won’t Get It

Date: January 09, 2025

Source: News18

Samsung is ready to enter the foldable space once again and we might see the brand introduce its own tri-fold phone later this year.

  • Samsung aims to enter the tri-fold phone market to compete with Huawei’s recently launched Mate XT.
  • The device is expected to feature an 'in-folding' mechanism, protecting the display when closed.
  • Initial production might be limited to around 300,000 units to manage sales expectations.
  • The company is under pressure to innovate as its foldable market share has stagnated.
  • Rumors suggest a potential delay to 2026 coinciding with Apple’s entry into the foldable phone market.
“Samsung is not expecting big sales from this product, which is why it might limit the production units to around 300,000.”

This anticipated release of the tri-fold phone reflects Samsung's efforts to innovate and reclaim its position in the competitive foldable market.

item.title: OPPO Reno 13 series launched with MediaTek D 8350 chip: Check price, specs - Business Standard
item.description:
OPPO Reno 13 Series Launched with MediaTek D 8350 Chip

Publication Date: Jan 09 2025 | Source: Business Standard

China's OPPO has launched its Reno 13 series in India, which includes Reno 13 and Reno 13 Pro smartphones, powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 System-on-Chip.

  • Reno 13 price starts at Rs 37,999; Reno 13 Pro starts at Rs 49,999.
  • Smartphones feature Android 15-based ColorOS 15 with AI imaging tools.
  • Available for pre-order with open sales starting on January 11, 2025.
  • Customers can get discounts and exchange bonuses during the launch period.
“The Reno 13 series smartphones are equipped with AI-driven features designed to enhance the user experience in imaging and productivity.”

In conclusion, the OPPO Reno 13 series combines advanced technology with attractive pricing, poised to capture consumer interest.

item.title: Multiplex chains expect ticket price rise, strong box office in 2025 - Business Standard
item.description:
Multiplex Chains Expect Ticket Price Rise and Strong Box Office in 2025

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Business Standard

India's multiplex chains are optimistic about a rise in average ticket prices and box office collections in 2025, fueled by an exciting lineup of films across Bollywood, Hollywood, and regional cinema.

  • Pushpa 2: The Rule broke box office records and had a significant impact on average ticket prices.
  • Multiplex chains expect a moderate rise in ATP due to a promising 2025 film lineup.
  • Key Bollywood releases include films featuring Salman Khan, Shah Rukh Khan, and Aamir Khan.
  • 2024 saw challenges with lower ATP but heightened audience resilience and love for cinema.
  • Innovative marketing strategies and rising interest in premium formats are anticipated to drive engagement.
“We are highly optimistic about 2025 and believe it will be a landmark year for the industry.” - Devang Sampat, MD, Cinepolis India

The multiplex industry is looking forward to a recovery in 2025 with a strong mix of blockbuster films and strategies aimed at increasing audience engagement.

item.title: Disney+ is Improving Its Image Quality With HDR10+ Support - Cord Cutters News
item.description:
Disney+ is Improving Its Image Quality With HDR10+ Support

Publication Date: CES 2025, Source: Cord Cutters News

Disney+ has announced its adoption of HDR10+, a high dynamic range technology that enhances viewing experiences. This decision positions Disney+ alongside other major streaming services that are also adopting HDR10+.

  • HDR10+ optimizes picture quality frame-by-frame, improving brightness, contrast, and color accuracy.
  • Electronic Arts has released Dragon Age: The Vailguard with HDR10+ support.
  • Intel announced that its latest ARC GPUs will support HDR10+ in nearly 30 products.
  • Panasonic Avionics has certified its in-flight entertainment displays for HDR10+.
  • HDR10+ is utilized in NextGen TV broadcasts by Gray Media and NBC 4 New York.
“This move by Disney+ signifies a broader trend towards wider adoption of HDR10+ in the entertainment industry.”

This advancement represents a trend towards the wider use of HDR10+, promising consumers a more vibrant visual experience.

item.title: Samsung shows off two tri-fold concept phones at CES 2025 – and I hope the right one gets made - TechRadar
item.description:
Samsung shows off two tri-fold concept phones at CES 2025

Date: January 2025 Source: TechRadar

Samsung Display has unveiled several new screen concepts at CES 2025, including two innovative tri-folding phone designs that could set the stage for the future of Galaxy smartphones.

  • Samsung Display showcased multiple screen concepts at CES 2025.
  • Two tri-folding phone screen designs were highlighted, each folding differently.
  • Both concepts feature two hinges and three screen sections, but with key differences in how they fold.
“Samsung is weighing up both options right now.”

The event hints at the potential launch of a tri-fold handset sooner rather than later, following trends set by competitors like Huawei.

item.title: What is Daily Listen? Google Plans Personalised Podcast Based on Discover Feed - Jagran Josh
item.description:
Daily Listen by Google: Tailored Podcasts at Your Fingertips

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Search Engine Land

Google is enhancing the way you consume news by introducing a cutting-edge feature called Daily Listen. This experimental tool delivers personalized, AI-generated audio recaps of news tailored specifically to your interests.

Key Points

  • Daily Listen creates customized podcasts based on your interests, utilizing AI to analyze your browsing and search preferences.
  • The feature provides audio summaries of important news topics in five minutes or less.
  • It is accessible from the Google app on Android and iOS, allowing for a convenient listening experience.
  • Currently being tested in the United States through Google Search Labs.
  • Includes an intuitive player interface with controls for playback options.
“Generative AI is experimental.”

The Daily Listen feature represents Google's initiative to offer a more personalized way to stay informed, showcasing the integration of AI in media consumption.
